title: PrismaPool for Watchmaker
description: Featuring the "DroidPool" artwork from our Drawn On Android project, PrismaPool for Watchmaker is inspired by the Merc with a Mouth and includes 11 theme choices.NOTE: NEEDS WATCHMAKER PREMIUM TO USEIf you don't have it, get it here -> http://goo.gl/FMxUfY Features Include:- 11 Color Choices (tap the DroidPool logo to change).- Local Weather and Temperature. (tap weather to refresh).- Watch Battery Indicator - Agenda Shortcut (tap date).PrismaPool is compatible with every Android Wear device through the Watchmaker app.
descriptionHTML:
Featuring the "DroidPool" artwork from our Drawn On Android project, PrismaPool for Watchmaker is inspired by the Merc with a Mouth and includes 11 theme choices.

NOTE: NEEDS WATCHMAKER PREMIUM TO USE
If you don't have it, get it here -> http://goo.gl/FMxUfY

Features Include:
- 11 Color Choices (tap the DroidPool logo to change).
- Local Weather and Temperature. (tap weather to refresh).
- Watch Battery Indicator
- Agenda Shortcut (tap date).

PrismaPool is compatible with every Android Wear device through the Watchmaker app.
